text: Bartolomeo Capobianco (died 1547) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano (1540–1547). ==Biography== On 8 January 1540, Bartolomeo Capobianco was appointed during the papacy of Pope Paul III as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano. He served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano until his death in 1547. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:16th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Paul III Category:1547 deaths
title: Bartolomeo Capobianco
